TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit IdnMapping extends System.Object

summary.span: 支持在 Internet 域名中使用非 ASCII 字符。

span.span: Supports the use of non-ASCII characters for Internet domain names.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Internet 域名由一个或多个名为 "域名标签" 的部分组成，用标签分隔符分隔。An Internet domain name consists of one or more parts, called domain name labels, separated by label separators. 例如，域名 "www.proseware.com" 由句点分隔的标签 "www"、"proseware" 和 "com" 组成。For example, the domain name "www.proseware.com" consists of the labels, "www", "proseware", and "com", separated by periods. 标准域名由 US-ASCII （或基本拉丁）字符范围中的指定字符（从 U + 0021 到 U + 007E）组成。Standard domain names consist of designated characters in the US-ASCII (or Basic Latin) character range, from U+0021 to U+007E. 为了便于不使用 US-ASCII 字符集的区域性中使用 Internet，在2003中采用了国际化域名（IDNA）标准，以支持在 US-ASCII 字符范围外包含 Unicode 字符。To facilitate Internet usage in cultures that do not use the US-ASCII character set, the Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA) standard was adopted in 2003 to support the inclusion of Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range. 但是，名称服务器和域名解析继续依赖于 US-ASCII 字符范围内的字符。However, name servers and domain name resolution continue to rely on characters within the US-ASCII character range. IDNA 机制使用 Punycode 将包含 US-ASCII 字符范围以外的 Unicode 字符的国际化域名映射到域名系统支持的 US-ASCII 字符范围。The IDNA mechanism uses Punycode to map an internationalized domain name that contains Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range to the US-ASCII character range supported by the domain name system. IDNA 机制仅用于转换域名，而不会转换通过 Internet 传输的数据。The IDNA mechanism is used to convert only domain names, not data transmitted over the Internet. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在中 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] ， 类支持 IDNA 标准的不同版本，具体取决于所使用的操作系统：In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the class supports different versions of the IDNA standard, depending on the operating system in use: > > - 在上运行时 [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] ，它支持由[RFC 5891：国际化域名（IDNA）：协议中](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)所述的 IDNA 标准2008版。When run on [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it supports the 2008 version of the IDNA standard outlined by [RFC 5891: Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875). > - 在早期版本的 Windows 操作系统上运行时，它支持 RFC 3490 所述标准的2003版本[：在应用程序中国际化域名（IDNA）](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110)。When run on earlier versions of the Windows operating system, it supports the 2003 version of the standard outlined by [RFC 3490: Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110). > > 请参阅[Unicode 技术标准 #46： IDNA 兼容性处理](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459)，以了解这些标准处理特定字符集的方式。See [Unicode Technical Standard #46: IDNA Compatibility Processing](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459) for the differences in the way these standards handle particular sets of characters. 方法规范化域名，并将规范化名称转换为一个表示形式，该表示形式由 us-ascii 码位范围内的可显示 Unicode 字符（u + 0020 到 U + 007E）组成，并为每个标签预先添加 ASCII 兼容的编码（ACE）前缀（"xn--"）。The method normalizes a domain name, converts the normalized name to a representation that consists of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII code point range (U+0020 to U+007E), and prepends an ASCII-compatible encoding (ACE) prefix ("xn--") to each label. 方法还原由方法转换的域名标签 。The method restores the domain name labels converted by the method. 如果要转换的字符串包括标签分隔符字符表意字句号（U + 3002）、全半形句号（U + FF0E）和半形象形字句号（U + FF61），则 方法将其转换为标签分隔符 FULL stop （period，U + 002E）。If the string to be converted includes the label separator characters IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+3002), FULLWIDTH FULL STOP (U+FF0E), and HALFWIDTH IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+FF61), the method converts them to the label separator FULL STOP (period, U+002E). 但是，方法不会还原原始标签分隔符。The method, however, does not restore the original label separator character. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法将国际化域名数组转换为 Punycode。The following example uses the method to convert an array of internationalized domain names to Punycode. 然后，方法将 Punycode 域名转换回原始域名，但将原始标签分隔符替换为标准标签分隔符。The method then converts the Punycode domain name back to the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.class/cs/conversion1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.class/vb/conversion1.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 的所有公共方法 都是线程安全的，并且可以从多个线程并发使用，前提是该 实例的属性不同时同时设置。

span.span: All public methods of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, as long as the instance's properties are not also set concurrently.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 属性将初始化为 `false` 。The and properties are initialized to `false`. 除 a-z、0-9 之外的一小部分 ASCII 字符（U + 002D）和句点（.）字符在域名中是允许的，但未赋值的 Unicode 码位不能使用。A small subset of ASCII characters other than A-Z, 0-9, the hyphen (-) character (U+002D), and the period (.) character are permitted in domain names, but unassigned Unicode code points are not.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool AllowUnassigned { get; set; }
.property instance bool AllowUnassigned
Public Property AllowUnassigned As Boolean
public: property bool AllowUnassigned { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AllowUnassigned : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当前 对象的成员所执行的操作中是否使用未分配的 Unicode 码位。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether unassigned Unicode code points are used in operations performed by members of the current object.

value.span: 如果在操作中使用未分配的码位，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if unassigned code points are used in operations; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已注册域名不能包含未分配的码位。A registered domain name cannot contain unassigned code points. 因此，属性的默认值 为 `false` 。Consequently, the default value of the property is `false`. IDNA 规范仅允许未赋值的代码点在匹配字符串（即在域名查找中）的查询中。The IDNA specification permits unassigned code points only in queries for matching strings (that is, in domain name lookup). 若要详细了解如何使用域名中未分配的码位，请参阅[rfc 3454 "国际化字符串（stringprep）的准备"](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873)和[rfc 5891，"应用程序中的国际化域名（IDNA）：协议"](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)。For more information about the use of unassigned code points in domain names, see [RFC 3454, "Preparation of Internationalized Strings (stringprep)"](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) and [RFC 5891, "Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol"](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875). > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果 属性为 `false` ，则与属性关联的行为取决于基础操作系统。If the property is `false`, the behavior associated with the property depends on the underlying operating system. 在上 [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] ， 类符合 IDNA 2008，后者基于 Unicode 6.0 标准。On [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], the class conforms to IDNA 2008, which is based on the Unicode 6.0 standard. 在以前版本的 Windows 上， 类基于 IDNA 2003，后者基于 Unicode 3。*x*。On previous versions of Windows, the class is based on IDNA 2003, which is based on Unicode 3.*x*. 在 IDNA 2003 中未赋值的某些码位已被分配字符，在 IDNA 2008 中受支持。Some code points that were unassigned in IDNA 2003 have been assigned characters and are supported in IDNA 2008. 例如，在 Unicode 4.0 中引入了 U + 0221。For example, U+0221 was introduced in Unicode 4.0. 在上 [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] ，将其编码为 "xn-6la"。On [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it is encoded as "xn—6la". 在以前版本的 Windows 上，它会引发 异常。On previous versions of Windows, it throws an exception.

summary.span: 将包含 US-ASCII 字符范围以外的Unicode字符的域名称标签字符串编码为（U+0020 至 U+007E）内的可显示 Unicode 字符的字符串。

span.span: Encodes a string of domain name labels that include Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range to a string of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E).

summary.span: 根据 IDNA 标准格式化的字符串。

span.span: The string is formatted according to the IDNA standard.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetAscii (string unicode);
.method public hidebysig instance string GetAscii(string unicode) cil managed
Public Function GetAscii (unicode As String) As String
public: System::String ^ GetAscii(System::String ^ unicode);
member this.GetAscii : string -> string

param.name: unicode
param.span: 要转换的字符串，它包含一个或多个由标签分隔符分隔的域名标签。

span.span: The string to convert, which consists of one or more domain name labels delimited with label separators.

summary.span: 将由 Unicode 字符组成的域名标签的字符串编码为 US-ASCII 字符范围内的可显示的 Unicode 字符的字符串。

span.span: Encodes a string of domain name labels that consist of Unicode characters to a string of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range.

summary.span: 根据 IDNA 标准格式化的字符串。

span.span: The string is formatted according to the IDNA standard.

returns.span: 由 参数指定的字符串的等效项包括 US-ASCII 字符范围（U+0020 至 U+007E）内的可显示 Unicode 字符并根据 IDNA 标准格式化。

span.span: The equivalent of the string specified by the parameter, consisting of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) and formatted according to the IDNA standard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `unicode`参数指定包含有效 Unicode 字符的一个或多个标签的字符串。The `unicode` parameter specifies a string of one or more labels that consist of valid Unicode characters. 标签用标签分隔符分隔。The labels are separated by label separators. `unicode`参数的开头不能为标签分隔符，但它可以包含和（可选）以分隔符结尾。The `unicode` parameter cannot begin with a label separator, but it can include and optionally end with a separator. 标签分隔符是完全停止（句号、U + 002E）、象形字完全停止（U + 3002）、全半形句号（U + FF0E）和半形象形字完全停止（U + FF61）。The label separators are FULL STOP (period, U+002E), IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+3002), FULLWIDTH FULL STOP (U+FF0E), and HALFWIDTH IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+FF61). 例如，域名 "www.adatum.com" 由句点分隔的标签 "www"、"adatum" 和 "com" 组成。For example, the domain name "www.adatum.com" consists of the labels, "www", "adatum", and "com", separated by periods. 标签不能包含以下任何字符：A label cannot contain any of the following characters: - 从 U + 0001 到 U + 001F 以及 U + 007F 的 Unicode 控制字符。Unicode control characters from U+0001 through U+001F, and U+007F. - 未赋值的 Unicode 字符，如果属性的值 为 `false` 。Unassigned Unicode characters, if the value of the property is `false`. - US-ASCII 字符范围中的非标准字符，如空格（U + 0020）、感叹号（U + 0021）和低线条（U + 005F）字符（如果属性的值 为） `true` 。Non-standard characters in the US-ASCII character range, such as the SPACE (U+0020), EXCLAMATION MARK (U+0021), and LOW LINE (U+005F) characters, if the value of the property is `true`. - IDNA 标准的特定版本禁止使用的字符。Characters that are prohibited by a specific version of the IDNA standard. 有关禁止字符的详细信息，请参阅[rfc 3454：为 IDNA 2003 准备国际化字符串（"stringprep"）](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) ， [RFC 5982： IDNA 2008 的应用程序的 Unicode 码位和国际化域名](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877)。For more information about prohibited characters, see [RFC 3454: Preparation of Internationalized Strings ("stringprep")](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) for IDNA 2003, and [RFC 5982: The Unicode Code Points and Internationalized Domain Names for Applications](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877) for IDNA 2008. 方法将所有标签分隔符转换为 FULL STOP （period，U + 002E）。The method converts all label separators to FULL STOP (period, U+002E). 如果 `unicode` 不包含 us-ascii 字符范围外的任何字符，并且不允许 us-ascii 字符范围内的任何字符，则此方法返回 `unicode` 未更改的。If `unicode` contains no characters outside the US-ASCII character range and no characters within the US-ASCII character range are prohibited, the method returns `unicode` unchanged. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法将国际化域名数组转换为 Punycode，这是由 us-ascii 字符范围内的字符组成的编码等效项。The following example uses the method to convert an array of internationalized domain names to Punycode, which is an encoded equivalent that consists of characters in the US-ASCII character range. 然后，方法将 Punycode 域名转换回原始域名，但将原始标签分隔符替换为标准标签分隔符。The method then converts the Punycode domain name back into the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.class/cs/conversion1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.class/vb/conversion1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 根据 和 属性以及 IDNA 标准， 是无效的。

span.span: is invalid based on the and properties, and the IDNA standard.

para.span: 在中 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] ， 类支持 IDNA 标准的不同版本，具体取决于所使用的操作系统：

span.span: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the class supports different versions of the IDNA standard, depending on the operating system in use:

para.span: -在上运行时 [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] ，它支持由[RFC 5891：国际化域名（IDNA）：协议中](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)所述的 IDNA 标准2008版。

span.span: - When run on [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it supports the 2008 version of the IDNA standard outlined by [RFC 5891: Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875).

para.span: -在早期版本的 Windows 操作系统上运行时，它支持 RFC 3490 所述标准的2003版本[：在应用程序中国际化域名（IDNA）](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110)。

span.span: - When run on earlier versions of the Windows operating system, it supports the 2003 version of the standard outlined by [RFC 3490: Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110).

para.span: 请参阅[Unicode 技术标准 #46： IDNA 兼容性处理](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459)，以了解这些标准处理特定字符集的方式。

span.span: See [Unicode Technical Standard #46: IDNA Compatibility Processing](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459) for the differences in the way these standards handle particular sets of characters.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetAscii (string unicode, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance string GetAscii(string unicode, int32 index) cil managed
Public Function GetAscii (unicode As String, index As Integer) As String
public: System::String ^ GetAscii(System::String ^ unicode, int index);
member this.GetAscii : string * int -> string

param.name: unicode
param.span: 要转换的字符串，它包含一个或多个由标签分隔符分隔的域名标签。

span.span: The string to convert, which consists of one or more domain name labels delimited with label separators.

param.name: index
param.span: 的从零开始的偏移量，用于指定开始转换的子字符串的位置。

span.span: A zero-based offset into that specifies the start of the substring to convert.

param.span: 转换运算将继续执行到 字符串的末尾。

span.span: The conversion operation continues to the end of the string.

summary.span: 编码包含US-ASCII字符范围以外的 Unicode 字符的域名称标签子字符串。

span.span: Encodes a substring of domain name labels that include Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range.

summary.span: 子串转换为在 US-ASCII 字符范围内可显示的“ Unicode ”字符串并根据 IDNA 标准格式化。

span.span: The substring is converted to a string of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range and is formatted according to the IDNA standard.

returns.span: 由 和 指定的子字符串的等效项包括 US-ASCII 字符范围（U+0020 至 U+007E）内的可显示 Unicode 字符并根据 IDNA 标准格式化。

span.span: The equivalent of the substring specified by the and parameters, consisting of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) and formatted according to the IDNA standard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `unicode`和 `index` 参数定义包含一个或多个包含有效 Unicode 字符的标签的子字符串。The `unicode` and `index` parameters define a substring with one or more labels that consist of valid Unicode characters. 标签用标签分隔符分隔。The labels are separated by label separators. 子字符串的第一个字符不能以标签分隔符开头，但它可以包含并且可以选择以分隔符结尾。The first character of the substring cannot begin with a label separator, but it can include and optionally end with a separator. 标签分隔符是完全停止（句号、U + 002E）、象形字完全停止（U + 3002）、全半形句号（U + FF0E）和半形象形字完全停止（U + FF61）。The label separators are FULL STOP (period, U+002E), IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+3002), FULLWIDTH FULL STOP (U+FF0E), and HALFWIDTH IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+FF61). 例如，域名 "www.adatum.com" 由句点分隔的标签 "www"、"adatum" 和 "com" 组成。For example, the domain name "www.adatum.com" consists of the labels, "www", "adatum", and "com", separated by periods. 标签不能包含以下任何字符：A label cannot contain any of the following characters: - 从 U + 0001 到 U + 001F 以及 U + 007F 的 Unicode 控制字符。Unicode control characters from U+0001 through U+001F, and U+007F. - 未赋值的 Unicode 字符，具体取决于属性的值 。Unassigned Unicode characters, depending on the value of the property. - US-ASCII 字符范围中的非标准字符，如空格（U + 0020）、叹号（U + 0021）和低线条（U + 005F）字符，具体取决于属性的值 。Non-standard characters in the US-ASCII character range, such as the SPACE (U+0020), EXCLAMATION MARK (U+0021), and LOW LINE (U+005F) characters, depending on the value of the property. - IDNA 标准的特定版本禁止使用的字符。Characters that are prohibited by a specific version of the IDNA standard. 有关禁止字符的详细信息，请参阅[rfc 3454：为 IDNA 2003 准备国际化字符串（"stringprep"）](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) ， [RFC 5982： IDNA 2008 的应用程序的 Unicode 码位和国际化域名](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877)。For more information about prohibited characters, see [RFC 3454: Preparation of Internationalized Strings ("stringprep")](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) for IDNA 2003, and [RFC 5982: The Unicode Code Points and Internationalized Domain Names for Applications](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877) for IDNA 2008. 方法将所有标签分隔符转换为 FULL STOP （period，U + 002E）。The method converts all label separators to FULL STOP (period, U+002E). 如果 `unicode` 不包含 us-ascii 字符范围外的任何字符，并且不允许 us-ascii 字符范围内的任何字符，则此方法返回 `unicode` 未更改的。If `unicode` contains no characters outside the US-ASCII character range and no characters within the US-ASCII character range are prohibited, the method returns `unicode` unchanged. ## Examples 下面的示例从电子邮件地址中删除了本地部分和 @ 字符，并将生成的域名传递给 方法以创建 Punycode 域名，该域名是由 us-ascii 字符范围内的字符组成的编码等效项。The following example removes the local part and the @ character from an email address, and passes the resulting domain name to the method to create a Punycode domain name, which is an encoded equivalent that consists of characters in the US-ASCII character range. 然后，方法将 Punycode 域名转换回原始域名，但将原始标签分隔符替换为标准标签分隔符。The method then converts the Punycode domain name back into the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.getascii/cs/conversion1a.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.getascii/vb/conversion1a.vb#2)]

exception.span: 根据 和 属性以及 IDNA 标准， 是无效的。

span.span: is invalid based on the and properties, and the IDNA standard.

para.span: 在中 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] ， 类支持 IDNA 标准的不同版本，具体取决于所使用的操作系统：

span.span: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the class supports different versions of the IDNA standard, depending on the operating system in use:

para.span: -在上运行时 [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] ，它支持由[RFC 5891：国际化域名（IDNA）：协议中](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)所述的 IDNA 标准2008版。

span.span: - When run on [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it supports the 2008 version of the IDNA standard outlined by [RFC 5891: Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875).

para.span: -在早期版本的 Windows 操作系统上运行时，它支持 RFC 3490 所述标准的2003版本[：在应用程序中国际化域名（IDNA）](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110)。

span.span: - When run on earlier versions of the Windows operating system, it supports the 2003 version of the standard outlined by [RFC 3490: Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110).

para.span: 请参阅[Unicode 技术标准 #46： IDNA 兼容性处理](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459)，以了解这些标准处理特定字符集的方式。

span.span: See [Unicode Technical Standard #46: IDNA Compatibility Processing](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459) for the differences in the way these standards handle particular sets of characters.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetAscii (string unicode, int index, int count);
.method public hidebysig instance string GetAscii(string unicode, int32 index, int32 count) cil managed
Public Function GetAscii (unicode As String, index As Integer, count As Integer) As String
public: System::String ^ GetAscii(System::String ^ unicode, int index, int count);
member this.GetAscii : string * int * int -> string

param.name: unicode
param.span: 要转换的字符串，它包含一个或多个由标签分隔符分隔的域名标签。

span.span: The string to convert, which consists of one or more domain name labels delimited with label separators.

param.name: index
param.span: 的从零开始的偏移量，用于指定子字符串的起始位置。

span.span: A zero-based offset into that specifies the start of the substring.

param.name: count
param.span: 要在 字符串中的 指定的位置开始的子字符串中转换的字符数。

span.span: The number of characters to convert in the substring that starts at the position specified by in the string.

summary.span: 编码包含 US-ASCII 字符范围以外的 Unicode 字符的域名称标签子字符串的指定字符数。

span.span: Encodes the specified number of characters in a substring of domain name labels that include Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range.

summary.span: 子串转换为在 US-ASCII 字符范围内可显示的“ Unicode ”字符串并根据 IDNA 标准格式化。

span.span: The substring is converted to a string of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range and is formatted according to the IDNA standard.

returns.span: 由 、 和 参数指定的子字符串的等效项，包括 US-ASCII 字符范围（U+0020 至 U+007E）内的可显示 Unicode 字符并根据 IDNA 标准格式化。

span.span: The equivalent of the substring specified by the , , and parameters, consisting of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) and formatted according to the IDNA standard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Unicode`、 `index` 和 `count` 参数定义包含一个或多个包含有效 Unicode 字符的标签的子字符串。The `Unicode`, `index`, and `count` parameters define a substring with one or more labels that consist of valid Unicode characters. 标签用标签分隔符分隔。The labels are separated by label separators. 子字符串的第一个字符不能以标签分隔符开头，但它可以包含并且可以选择以分隔符结尾。The first character of the substring cannot begin with a label separator, but it can include and optionally end with a separator. 标签分隔符是完全停止（句号、U + 002E）、象形字完全停止（U + 3002）、全半形句号（U + FF0E）和半形象形字完全停止（U + FF61）。The label separators are FULL STOP (period, U+002E), IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+3002), FULLWIDTH FULL STOP (U+FF0E), and HALFWIDTH IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+FF61). 例如，域名 "www.adatum.com" 由句点分隔的标签 "www"、"adatum" 和 "com" 组成。For example, the domain name "www.adatum.com" consists of the labels, "www", "adatum", and "com", separated by periods. 标签不能包含以下任何字符：A label cannot contain any of the following characters: - 从 U + 0001 到 U + 001F 以及 U + 007F 的 Unicode 控制字符。Unicode control characters from U+0001 through U+001F, and U+007F. - 未赋值的 Unicode 字符，具体取决于属性的值 。Unassigned Unicode characters, depending on the value of the property. - US-ASCII 字符范围中的非标准字符，如空格（U + 0020）、叹号（U + 0021）和低线条（U + 005F）字符，具体取决于属性的值 。Non-standard characters in the US-ASCII character range, such as the SPACE (U+0020), EXCLAMATION MARK (U+0021), and LOW LINE (U+005F) characters, depending on the value of the property. - IDNA 标准的特定版本禁止使用的字符。Characters that are prohibited by a specific version of the IDNA standard. 有关禁止字符的详细信息，请参阅[rfc 3454：为 IDNA 2003 准备国际化字符串（"stringprep"）](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) ， [RFC 5982： IDNA 2008 的应用程序的 Unicode 码位和国际化域名](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877)。For more information about prohibited characters, see [RFC 3454: Preparation of Internationalized Strings ("stringprep")](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) for IDNA 2003, and [RFC 5982: The Unicode Code Points and Internationalized Domain Names for Applications](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877) for IDNA 2008. 方法将所有标签分隔符转换为 FULL STOP （period，U + 002E）。The method converts all label separators to FULL STOP (period, U+002E). 如果子字符串不包含 US-ASCII 字符范围外的任何字符，并且不允许在 US-ASCII 字符范围内包含任何字符，则该方法将返回未更改的子字符串。If the substring contains no characters outside the US-ASCII character range, and no characters within the US-ASCII character range are prohibited, the method returns the substring unchanged. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法将国际化域名转换为符合 IDNA 标准的域名。The following example uses the method to convert an internationalized domain name to a domain name that complies with the IDNA standard. 然后，方法将标准化域名转换回原始域名，但会将原始标签分隔符替换为标准标签分隔符。The method then converts the standardized domain name back into the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator. [!code-csharp[IdnMapping.GetX#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IdnMapping.GetX/CS/getx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IdnMapping.GetX#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IdnMapping.GetX/VB/getx.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override int GetHashCode ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer
public: override int GetHashCode();
override this.GetHashCode : unit -> int

summary.span: 返回此 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: Returns a hash code for this object.

returns.span: 从 对象的属性派生的四个 32 位常量中的一个。

span.span: One of four 32-bit signed constants derived from the properties of an object.

returns.span: 返回值没有特殊意义，不适合在哈希代码算法中使用。

span.span: The return value has no special meaning and is not suitable for use in a hash code algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你的应用程序需要实现有意义的哈希代码算法，则重写方法。Override the method if your application needs to implement a meaningful hash code algorithm. ## Examples 下面的示例假设单个字符串可以包含由空格分隔的多个电子邮件地址。The following example assumes that a single string can contain multiple email addresses separated by spaces. 它从每个电子邮件地址中删除本地部分和 @ 字符，并将生成的域名传递给 或 方法，以创建 Punycode 域名。It removes the local part and the @ character from each email address, and passes the resulting domain name to the or method to create a Punycode domain name. 然后，方法将 Punycode 域名转换回原始域名。The method then converts the Punycode domain name back into the original domain name. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.getascii/cs/conversion1b.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.getascii/vb/conversion1b.vb#3)]

summary.span: 对基于 IDNA 标准编码为 Unicode 字符串的一个或多个域名标签进行解码。

span.span: Decodes one or more domain name labels encoded according to the IDNA standard to a string of Unicode characters.

Public Function GetUnicode (ascii As String) As String
public: System::String ^ GetUnicode(System::String ^ ascii);

param.name: ascii
param.span: 要解码的字符串，包含根据 IDNA 标准在 US-ASCII 字符范围 （U+0020 至 U+007E） 编码的一个或多个标签。

span.span: The string to decode, which consists of one or more labels in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) encoded according to the IDNA standard.

summary.span: 对基于 IDNA 标准编码的一个或者多个域名标签的字符串进行解码，解码为一个 Unicode 字符串。

span.span: Decodes a string of one or more domain name labels, encoded according to the IDNA standard, to a string of Unicode characters.

returns.span: 由 参数指定的 IDNA 子字符串的 Unicode 等效项。

span.span: The Unicode equivalent of the IDNA substring specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关域名、标签和标签分隔符的详细信息，请参阅方法的备注 。For more information about domain names, labels, and label separators, see the remarks for the method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法将国际化域名数组转换为 Punycode。The following example uses the method to convert an array of internationalized domain names to Punycode. 然后，方法将 Punycode 域名转换回原始域名，但将原始标签分隔符替换为标准标签分隔符。The method then converts the Punycode domain name back into the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator. MemberSignature.Value: public bool UseStd3AsciiRules { get; set; }
.property instance bool UseStd3AsciiRules
Public Property UseStd3AsciiRules As Boolean
public: property bool UseStd3AsciiRules { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseStd3AsciiRules : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在当前 对象的成员所执行的操作中是使用标准命名约定还是宽松命名约定。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether standard or relaxed naming conventions are used in operations performed by members of the current object.

value.span: 如果在操作中使用标准命名转换，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if standard naming conventions are used in operations; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 遵循标准命名规则的域名由 US-ASCII 字符范围中的特定字符子集组成。Domain names that follow standard naming rules consist of a specific subset of characters in the US-ASCII character range. 字符是字母 A 到 Z、数字0到9和连字符（-）字符（U + 002D）和句点（.）字符。The characters are the letters A through Z, the digits 0 through 9, the hyphen (-) character (U+002D), and the period (.) character. 字符的大小写并不重要。The case of the characters is not significant. 宽松命名约定允许使用范围更广的 ASCII 字符，其中包括空格字符（U + 0020）、感叹号字符（U + 0021）和 underbar 字符（U + 005F）。Relaxed naming conventions allow the use of a broader range of ASCII characters, including the space character (U+0020), the exclamation point character (U+0021), and the underbar character (U+005F). 如果 为 `true` ，则在由方法返回的标签中只能出现标准字符 。If is `true`, only standard characters can appear in a label returned by the method. 默认情况下，属性的值 为 `false` ，并且在标签中允许使用 ASCII 字符的扩展子集。By default, the value of the property is `false`, and an expanded subset of ASCII characters is permitted in a label. > [!NOTE] > 类禁止在域名标签中使用 nondisplayable 字符 U + 0000 到 u + 001F 和 U + 007F，而不考虑属性的设置 。The class prohibits the use of the nondisplayable characters U+0000 through U+001F, and U+007F in domain name labels regardless of the setting of the property. 此禁止会降低安全攻击的风险，如名称欺骗。This prohibition reduces the risk of security attacks such as name spoofing. ## Examples 下面的示例生成包含 ASCII 范围内 U + 0000 到 U + 007F 的字符的 Url，并将其传递给 两个对象的方法 。The following example generates URLs that contain characters in the ASCII range from U+0000 to U+007F and passes them to the method of two objects. 一个对象的 属性设置为 `true` ，另一个对象将它设置为 `false` 。One object has its property set to `true`, and the other object has it set to `false`. 当属性为时，输出将显示无效的字符 `true` `false` 。The output displays the characters that are invalid when the property is `true` but valid when it is `false`. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.usestd3asciirules/cs/usestd3asciirules1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.usestd3asciirules/vb/usestd3asciirules1.vb#1)]
